Title: Requires insurance coverage parity for certain services delivered via telehealth
Summary: Requires insurance coverage parity for primary care services delivered via telehealth, where both the insured individual and the health care provider are located in a clinical setting.
LawCode: Amd §§3217-h & 4306-g, Ins L; amd §4406-g, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to requiring insurance coverage parity for certain services delivered via telehealth
